author: geirm
msg: Edits and additions, and new section for the misc and in-progress.

author: geirm
msg: Update with translations on the left-side menu

author: geirm
msg: Added section on menu for international translations.  Currently we have
japanse and US English. (Do we need a UK English translation so UK
users don't get confused by words like 'color' and 'center'? :)  The
English link is there so the translated versions can have a link to the
English. Much thanks to the Ja-Jakarta project for such beautiful work.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - added a fix so that contextProperties specified in the <texen>
task are loaded correctly: relative paths now take ${basedir}
into consideration while absolute paths are left alone. i lifted
the logic recently added for loading multiple template paths :-)

author: jvanzyl
msg: - updating test jar, the service properties has my old
email address which was making the test fail.
